meanings.definition: The quality or state of being overt.
meanings.sent1: Her overtness in expressing her feelings made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The overtness of his actions left no room for doubt.
meanings.sent3: The overtness of the clown's makeup made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The overtness of the sunrise painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The overtness of the warning sign caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The overtness of his confession surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: His overtness in admitting his mistake was admirable.
meanings.sent3: The overtness of the dog's excitement was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The overtness of the applause filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The overtness of the protest made a strong statement.
